Package dog.giraffe.cluster

Interface ClusteringStrategy<P extends Points>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Log
    public interface ClusteringStrategy<P extends Points>
extends Log
    A method for clustering vectors. All possible method specific parameters are captured by instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <P extends Points>
      ClusteringStrategy<P>      		 best​(java.util.List<ClusteringStrategy<P>> strategies)
      Executes all the strategies and selects the result with the smallest error.
      void cluster​(Context context, P points, Continuation<Clusters> continuation)
      Cluster the specified points.
      static <P extends Points>
      ClusteringStrategy<P>      		 elbow​(double errorLimit, int maxClusters, int minClusters, Function<java.lang.Integer,​ClusteringStrategy<P>> strategy, int threads)
      Runs all the strategies in the interval [minClusters, maxClusters] and selects the one where the error stops to decrease significantly.

    • Method Detail

      • best

        static <P extends Points> ClusteringStrategy<P> best​(java.util.List<ClusteringStrategy<P>> strategies)
        Executes all the strategies and selects the result with the smallest error. All the strategies will be run in parallel.

      • cluster

        void cluster​(Context context,
             P points,
             Continuation<Clusters> continuation)
      throws java.lang.Throwable
        Cluster the specified points.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • elbow

        static <P extends Points> ClusteringStrategy<P> elbow​(double errorLimit,
                                                      int maxClusters,
                                                      int minClusters,
                                                      Function<java.lang.Integer,​ClusteringStrategy<P>> strategy,
                                                      int threads)
        Runs all the strategies in the interval [minClusters, maxClusters] and selects the one where the error stops to decrease significantly. More specifically it returns the result for which errorLimit <= next.error / result.error.
        Parameters:
        threads - the maximum number of threads used to run strategies
